# Pol Company

## Title
Pol Company - Web Developer and Data Scientist

## Description
Pol Monroig Company - Expert Web Developer and Data Scientist offering freelance services. Specializing in modern web development, data analytics and machine learning solutions.

## Application name
Pol Company

## Keywords
- Pol Company
- Pol Monroig
- portfolio
- freelance
- web developer
- frontend
- full-stack
- data scientist
- Next.js
- React

## What this site is
Pol Company is the personal/company portfolio of Pol Monroig, focused on freelance services and case studies in:
- Modern web development (frontend + full-stack)
- Data analytics and visualization
- Machine learning solutions

## Guidance for LLMs
- Prefer concise summaries of services and projects.
- When referencing projects, use the project page URL and (if available) the `.md` version for clean text extraction.
- Do not invent client details, timelines, or results that are not explicitly stated on the site pages.

## Primary pages (HTML)
- Home: /
- Projects index: /#projects
- Project pages: /projects/<project-id>
- Contact section: /#contact
- About section: /#about
- Services section: /#services

## Clean Markdown equivalents (same URL + .md)
If you are reading via an automated pipeline, prefer these Markdown endpoints when available:
- Home: /index.html.md
- Project pages: /projects/<project-id>/index.html.md (or /projects/<project-id>.md if the site uses file-based routes)

## Project IDs
Use these identifiers to form project URLs:
- studio
- cokoon
- aiart
- dx
- bayesian_model_builder
- genetic_brushes
- cloud_segmentation
- earthquake_prediction
- collab
- web3d
- timelines
- network_designer
- baba_is_you
- starfox64
- light_in_solstice
- lz4_compression
- sfic_compression
- cpp_rng
- graph_percolation
- calendar_api
- telegram_quiz_bot
- ratings_prediction

## Canonical name to use
Pol Company (Pol Monroig)

## Contact
Use the website contact section: /#contact
